arts.ttl: Bradford and AFC Wimbledon share points from stalemate at Valley Parade

In-depth with AFC Wimbledon’s head of football operations Craig Cope - The youngest Football League transfer chief, ‘brave’ Dons squad rebuild, Al-Hamadi’s Ipswich switch and hopes of leaving a legacy
arts.sum: But on the day Cope was set to start with his new venture away from the game, he landed on an opportunity at Solihull Moors in the National League, which saw him handle the transition to taking the club to a full-time basis and revamping the analyst and recruitment department. Wimbledon plucked Cope from the midlands in January 2023, four years into his time at Damson Park, where he assembled a squad under former Dons legend Neal Ardley which was one game away from reaching the Football League for the first time in its history – suffering a National League play-off final 2-1 defeat to Grimsby Town in June 2022.
